scenes.action_text: AMERICAN HUSTLE Written by Eric Warren Singer and David O. Russell TITLE CARD: SOME OF THIS ACTUALLY HAPPENED OVER BLACK: APRIL 26, 1978, PLAZA HOTEL, NEW YORK 1 FADE IN: 2 INT. PLAZA HOTEL WINDOW NYC - DAY IRVING ROSENFELD, not a small man, gets dressed and meticulously constructs his combover. Camera WRAPS AROUND, see his hands with rings adjust his dark velvet suit, up to his face, serious, concentrated, intense, h
